Ghost Sword.name: Ghost Sword
Ghost Sword.fullText:
Ghost Blade Attack 11Ghost Sword

Your attack cuts through all planes of existence, ensuring that even ghostly forms suffer your wrath.

Encounter        Arcane, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Intelligence vs. Reflex

Hit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. This damage ignores the insubstantial quality.

  Aegis of Assault: When you use your aegis of assault to teleport and make an attack, you can use this power in place of the melee basic attack.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 65.
Ghost Sword.flavor: Your attack cuts through all planes of existence, ensuring that even ghostly forms suffer your wrath.

Target: One creature

Phase Evasion.name: Phase Evasion
Phase Evasion.fullText:
Ghost Blade Utility 12Phase Evasion

Your foe might have thought to get the better of you, but before its attack, you wink out and attempt to dodge the assault.

Daily        Arcane
Immediate Interrupt      Personal

Trigger: A melee attack hits you

Effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex against the triggering attack, and until the end of your next turn, you become insubstantial and gain phasing.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 65.
Phase Evasion.flavor: Your foe might have thought to get the better of you, but before its attack, you wink out and attempt to dodge the assault.
Phase Evasion.range:
Personal

Trigger: A melee attack hits you

Effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex against the triggering attack, and until the end of your next turn, you become insubstantial and gain phasing.
Phase Evasion.effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex against the triggering attack, and until the end of your next turn, you become insubstantial and gain phasing.

Omnipresent Assault.name: Omnipresent Assault
Omnipresent Assault.fullText:
Ghost Blade Attack 20Omnipresent Assault

You step across dimensional boundaries, seeming to be everywhere on the battlefield at once, unleashing an attack against each foe.

Daily        Arcane, Teleportation, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Requirement: You must be phasing or insubstantial.

Target: Each enemy you can see when you first use the power

Effect: Before each attack, you teleport to a space that must be adjacent to the target.

Attack: Intelligence vs. AC

Hit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.

Effect: Until you have attacked each eligible target once, you can teleport adjacent to a different target and repeat the attack against the new target. You then teleport back to your starting position.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 65.
